title: Desmond Ridder Joins the Show
description:
Laura, Dan, Mel, Schefter, and Marcus discuss Aiden Hutchinson or Travon Walker #1 to the Jaguars, how the wide receivers in this draft compare to each other, bold predictions for the draft, and Desmond Ridder joins the show. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
